name: Crowne Plaza Manchester Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Stayed one night before the Man U/Man C game last week. Great hotel, good location and wonderful staff. Really took care of us well. The hotel is new and beautifully decorated. Separate club room for Priority Members. Whatever you do, become a Priority club member and every IHG hotel will treat you like GOLD. Only place I will stay when I go back.
reviews.title: Super

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: Always stay here for convenience when in Manchester. Nothing ever too much trouble for the staff, free wifi for platinum members is a hit but £24 for 24 hours is bordering on highway robbery!
reviews.title: Business stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ate in room which as always is excellent and sleep quality same.
reviews.title: Great place to relax before your flight

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Once again only gripe and its the same with all Crown plaza's and holiday inns is breakfast, Medicare fair to say h least, no imagination at all and hasn't changed for years. Get your act together as a band.
reviews.title: Good start to the holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel at the airport. Rooms of excellent standard, modern and comfortable. Restaurant and joining pub both great to relax in and to eat. Hotel also lay on minibus to transport you to and from your terminal. Great way to start or finish a holiday. My family and I have used this hotel several times over the years when going on holiday. It can be cheaper to have an overnight stay and fly from Manchester than to fly from Scotland. Special mention to Thomas in the restaurant, he is efficient but can have friendly banter with you.
reviews.title: One happy smoker

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really nice hotel, great value.
reviews.title: Great value for park and stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is really comfortable, didn't have any issues with aircraft noise, slept well. Check in and out and car paperwork is effortless.
reviews.title: Great night away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: We were having to park our car somewhere anyway and for an extra £20 we stayed overnight, saving us a 4am rise to drive for our flight in the morning.
reviews.title: Best Thai Restaurant Ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have stayed in many airport hotels, this is one of the better ones.
reviews.title: Stay the night, start your holiday a day early

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Transit to the airport very convenient as well.
reviews.title: Nice touches in bedroom

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have stayed here on a number of occaisions,always know we will get a good bed, quiet,clean, excellent facilities in room,Asian food,pub food,restaurant,free shuttle to the terminals and railway station!Stay in a club room includes lounge facilities and free bar and delightful "nibbles" between 6 and 8 pm.
reviews.title: value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed 3 nights at this hotel, 1 night at the start of a short trip to visit UK relatives and 2 before returning home, it was chosen because proximity to the airport.
reviews.title: OK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service was excellent with friendly helpful staff, room was comfortable and the prepaid 9.95 breakfast was more than adequate to start the day.
reviews.title: OK at best - not 4*

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: We had a fish & chip meal in the restaurant, it was nothing special for the money
reviews.title: Some how didn't quite make it..

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lacking was free Wifi, when the smaller hotels/pubs can offer this service, why can't Crowne Plaza when they are charging so much more?,
reviews.title: below expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stay here quite frequently as I'm Air Crew for an airline and its widely accepted as one of the best airport hotels in the UK. The location is ideal, just a 3 minute walk to terminals 1 & 3 and in close proximity to the sky link to T2, new hire car village and train station. Not to mention the hotel shuttle bus that runs through out the day (for rainy days). Not once have I had to wait more than a minute to check in, and when I have-the staff are professional, friendly and knowledgable. The rooms are all well furnished, clean, tidy and just generally all up together.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel - ticks every box

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: No swimming pool (yet) but a well equipped gym and numerous professional venues for work purposes. Some very pleasant local pubs with open fires etc and the train station darts you into the city centre should you need it. But the hotel also offers a couple of nice and well priced restaurants and a very thorough bar! Plus the 'in house' pub for perhaps the more casual/sport related evening.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013
reviews.text: I stayed just a few days ago and the hotel staff, and manager particularly, went to every effort to help with a personal set of circumstances. This hotel offers that personal touch that so many places lack these days. Every box is ticked.
reviews.title: Bad Airport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed one night prior to our holiday. The hotel is ideally located for the Departures at Manchester Airport and is easily walked in around 5 mins. The room was nice, clean and spacious and the food was very nice with the staff being attentive. We saw the shuttle bus but the amount of people waiting to board made it easier to walk to the airport. It was easy to sort the car out and it was waiting for us upon our return from our trip. I would recommend this hotel, and would be happy to stay there again.
reviews.title: Excellent airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night as I am a self confessed aircraft spotter , we dont live close to Manchester Airport so as a treat when we can I will book a hotel for the night and get some spotting in. When we arrived the check in had one member of staff on, we were asked to wait whilst she assisted her collegue to do something. 10 minutes later still waiting with the queue really backing up now. Anyway she returned and checked us in. Room was on 4th floor and it wasnt big enough to swing a cat around in. I also have epilepsy so if i would of had a fit in there god knows what I would of done to myself as there was no floor space what so ever. The pillows were herendous! I have never had a pillow like it so thin it was pointless having them even on the bed. It really dissapoints me that the hotel was like that after really looking forward to staying over. Spoke to reception about my complaints she said that she will pass my info on to the manager to call me back.
reviews.title: Full service

aka: Crowne Plaza Manchester Airport Hotel Manchester
description: A fantastic Manchester Airport Hotel superbly located on the Airport complex, the four-star Crowne Plaza Hotel is within easy access of the M56, M60 and M62 as well as Manchester City Centre. The hotel boasts a stylish restaurant and bar, offering modern cuisine in a relaxed and informal atmosphere. Accommodation includes 294 well-appointed air-conditioned bedrooms that are ideal for both the business and leisure traveller. High-speed internet access is also available in all rooms. Spacious family rooms and Accessible rooms are also available. A complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport is available to all guests. The Park Stay & Go package offers guests accommodation, long stay parking & courtesy transport to & from the airport. Vehicles are transferred to a secure off site car parking facility working in conjunction with APCOA. Please note parking is for cars only. The Crowne Plaza has four superb dining options, plus 24 hour room service. We also offer small meeting facilities and ample car parking with accessible spaces.
